'''Heart of Depth''', also called '''Ocean Conqueror''' in the [[Adventurer Handbook]], is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Peak of Vindagnyr]].
